hackathon-rules: All participants have to sign the code of conduct and guidelines.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: To qualify, you need to use Nuance MIX API to build an application.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=51 Rue Sherbrooke Ouest, Montréal, QC H2X 1X2, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
How original is this hack and why?
What kind of impact does it have? Who is it impacting?

How technically hard was this hack to implement?
How well developed is the app in the short span of the hackathon?
What kind of AI were used, how technically difficult is it to implement?

How forward thinking is this idea?
Does it push any boundaries? And which boundaries?
How does this contribute to the field of AI?

How well did they present the demo?
How confident were they with it's application?
Were they well prepared for the demo?

hackathon-location-address: 51 Rue Sherbrooke Ouest, Montréal, QC H2X 1X2, Canada
hackathon-description-header: Implement concrete Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence applications.
